meanings.definition: The plasma membrane of a muscle fiber.
meanings.sent1: The sarcolemmas protect the muscle fiber.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the sarcolemmas to understand muscle fibers better.
meanings.sent3: The sarcolemmas of the muscle fiber were feeling shy today.
meanings.sent4: The sarcolemmas, like a shield, guard the muscle fiber from harm.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the sarcolemmas look like a delicate web surrounding the muscle fiber.

meanings.definition: The outer membrane of a muscle cell.
meanings.sent1: The sarcolemmas of the muscle cell provide structure.
meanings.sent2: Exercise can affect the health of the sarcolemmas in muscle cells.
meanings.sent3: The sarcolemmas of the muscle cell were happily dancing in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The sarcolemmas, like a fortress wall, protect the muscle cell.
